title: Blended Learning-Based Foundational Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program for Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary-level proficiency in basic arithmetic operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division)
context.additional_context: A blended learning course delivering foundational math concepts for workplace data analysis to working professionals, integrating online content and offline activities via personal devices. Requires customized design considering organizational culture and learning preferences.

learning_goals: Explain basic math concepts (ratios, statistics, graph interpretation) with over 80% accuracy for 10 hours per week using a blended learning platform
Solve work-case-based math problems (e.g., budget calculations, performance metric analysis) with over 90% participation through offline group activities
Establish and execute a self-directed learning plan in a blended learning environment using personal devices with over 85% completion rate
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
